children.text: Leading development of generative AI solutions and data analytics platforms in the pharmaceutical industry. Architecting full-stack applications that leverage LLMs, RAG pipelines, and cloud technologies to transform medical insights delivery and clinical trial data management.

responsibilities: Architect and engineer full-stack generative AI SaaS applications using serverless RAG pipelines with LLMs and vector search
Design Python-based AI solutions for medical conference session curation and analysis
Build centralized data analytics platforms integrating Salesforce, Tableau, and Form Assembly
Implement enterprise authentication and security using Okta
Deploy and manage cloud infrastructure on AWS for production AI applications
achievements: Reduced medical insight delivery time by 50% through automated AI-powered analysis and summarization
Decreased manual review of 6,000-8,000 conference sessions from 1-2 weeks to minutes
Improved data accessibility and reporting efficiency by 50% with centralized analytics solution
Successfully deployed enterprise-grade Gen AI applications with serverless architecture
Implemented secure, scalable solutions handling structured and unstructured medical data

children.text: Conducted cutting-edge research in AI and machine learning applications for healthcare and scientific computing. Developed deep learning models for medical image analysis and optimization algorithms for protein crystallization, deploying production-ready systems on cloud platforms.

responsibilities: Develop and deploy deep learning models for medical image classification and analysis
Build full-stack cloud applications using Django, React, AWS, and Azure
Collaborate with medical researchers at Penn State Health Milton S. Hershey Medical Center
Execute full Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) for AI research projects
Optimize algorithms and systems for performance and scalability
achievements: Built deep learning model achieving 80% accuracy in classifying Atypical Parkinsonian diseases using MRI scans
Developed cloud-based protein crystallization optimization platform reducing processing time by 50%
Enabled remote access for 10+ researchers through AWS and Azure deployment
Successfully deployed production AI systems with full SDLC execution
Contributed to advancing medical AI research through collaboration with healthcare professionals

children.text: Led cloud infrastructure and DevOps initiatives for enterprise clients including KPMG International. Spearheaded microservices architecture deployment on Azure, built CI/CD pipelines, and optimized infrastructure automation using Terraform across multiple cloud platforms.

responsibilities: Lead team of 4 engineers in deploying enterprise applications on Azure Cloud for KPMG International
Design and build CI/CD pipelines for Kubernetes clusters automating deployment and scaling
Implement infrastructure as code using Terraform for Azure and Google Cloud Platform
Optimize Docker containerization practices and implement security best practices
Provision and manage 16+ microservices in production environments
achievements: Achieved 99.9% uptime for enterprise applications through automated deployment and monitoring
Reduced deployment time by 50% with optimized CI/CD pipelines
Decreased infrastructure provisioning time by 40% using Terraform modules for DNS, IAM, and access management
Reduced Docker image size by 35% through Python automation and optimization
Successfully deployed microservices architecture ensuring seamless scalability for e-commerce and accounting applications
